short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with useful web browsing utilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your web browsing experience with some simple utilities for webpages. Page Utilities Plus is completely free, with no account required and no premium version available.

Features:
-Scroll up and down in one click
-See the number of words on a page or in selected text
-Highlight & mark sections of text for later. Text stays highlighted even after leaving a page and coming back
-Jump-to marked text: automatically scrolls to previously highlighted text in one click
-Intelligent search bar keyword highlighting on results page & first-level follow-through result pages. Works on most website search bars
-Ultra-simple UI to toggle each feature depending on your web browsing needs

This extension is brand new, if you encounter a bug or have a feature suggestion, please use the Google support group listed below.
